reviews.review: The star power was definitely in this movie. I was expecting more fight from the heroes as some left me scratchingy head. It's almost as if you wanted the dark side to prevail which was weird. I still think Spiderman sucks in this as well. The ending was some shock value. This one was a flat line for me....not all fantastic and not all bad either. Go check it out though.. I am sure it's more to this puzzle. #KIRR #AVENGERS #INFINITYWAR #ABITDUSTY #HMMM

I went into this movie with big expectations....and it delivered!  thanos is the best villain yet in the mcu.  not only does he demonstrate the ability to physically challenge our heroes but the movie also gives ample screen time to flesh out his convictions and strong will to not give up on his intentions, no matter the cost.  I only have two gripes about the movie...  and they are totally forgivable:  1) I felt like there was a little to much humor.  it was good 90% of the time but felt shoehorned in in a few places where it wasnt needed IMO.  2) I wish we had gotten some description of thanos's henchmen.  it didnt hurt the movie by not explaining them, but unless you are nerdy enough to care and go look them all up to understand THEIR powers, it just inexplicable eye candy when they fight with our heroes.  even if there was just a simple explanation by gamora maybe giving a quick rundown of their names and abilities when shes telling thor about thanos...  or even if Bruce could mention stuff to Tony and Strange when he landed all freaked out.  other than those 2 minor things, I think this movie really knocked it out of the park!  I was amazed to find out afterwards how long the movie was.  it was good enough that it really kept my interest the entire time and I didnt notice the long runtime.

An absolute chore to watch. A frankly odd villain motivation coupled with boring dialogue and a sparsely connected storyline made me somehow not care about characters that I have been watching on the big screen for years.

The MCU guys really have this movie making thing down. This movie is extremely well executed. Great plot, story, script. The actors are terrific. It has a great pace, and the job it does of linking the story lines through time is remarkable. 

It also shares something that most super hero movies cannot do. It truly has some surprises and zigs whennyou think it will zag. My ninth grade daughter, who absolutely loves everything Marvel, loved the movie. She bought in 100%. The film has action, the right level of comedy and above all; HEART and EMOTION. 

I'm not a spoiler, but I for one can't wait to see the next chapter, and I hope this team can keep this mojo that they have kept going for 10 years now. 

Incredible movie on its own. 
The MCU is the biggest, most ambitious and thoroughly entertaining cinematic experiences in theatrical history. We are watching something that I doubt will ever come again. So enjoy it.
Epic!!! Marvel knocked it out of the box once again.

it is exactly what I wanted in a marvel movie: an awesome villain, lots of action, lots of fights, great score, and a wonderful combination of all the mcu heroes.  Do you like action and good fights? don't listen to the critics, go buy your tickets and just enjoy!  Thank you Russo Brothers for this awesome movie!

So many feels when it comes to this movie. I want to rate it 10/10 but at the same time give it a -10/10. Haha, such a good Marvel film. Also, the action scenes were amazing. My one complaint is that it was a little jumpy, other than that I thought is was emotional, action packed, and funnyz
